Package io.github.nikmang.shserver.game

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
io.github.nikmang.shserver.game.GameBoard
class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
The gameboard instance used for playing and keeping track of various positions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameBoard​(PlayerConfiguration config)
    Creates default game size: 6 fascist spaces, 5 liberal spaces and no cards played.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) int getDeadlockCount()
    Returns the current count for deadlocks in the game.
    (package private) Party getWinner()
    Get the winner for the game.
    Based on if current card played count is equal to the target count.

    For statistical purposes Party.HITLER is also a winner if Party.FASCIST wins.
    Otherwise Party.NONE is returned.
    (package private) void incrementDeadlock()
    Increments deadlock count.
    (package private) GameBoardEffect playPiece​(Card card)
    Places a card on to the field and returns said effect from the configuration it was played at.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      GameBoard​(PlayerConfiguration config)
      Creates default game size: 6 fascist spaces, 5 liberal spaces and no cards played.
      Parameters:
      config - Player configuration, should be based on player count.

  • Method Details

    • playPiece

      GameBoardEffect playPiece​(Card card)
      Places a card on to the field and returns said effect from the configuration it was played at. Increments internal counter for said piece. Sets deadlock to 0.
      Parameters:
      card - Card type to be played.
      Returns:
      game board effect that is specified in PlayerConfiguration.

    • getWinner

      Party getWinner()
      Get the winner for the game.
      Based on if current card played count is equal to the target count.

      For statistical purposes Party.HITLER is also a winner if Party.FASCIST wins.
      Otherwise Party.NONE is returned.

      Returns:
      Party of the winner of the game.

    • getDeadlockCount

      int getDeadlockCount()
      Returns the current count for deadlocks in the game.
      Returns:
      current deadlock count.

    • incrementDeadlock

      void incrementDeadlock()
      Increments deadlock count.
